languages.text: "Это гнев Лилэтан — гнев, нашедший воплощение в самой природе, в самом естестве мироустройства... да хранят нас боги, как мы не замечали этого раньше..." {n}Бросив на вас взгляд, Ирлиэт тут же отводит глаза.{/n}

"It is the Lilaethan's wrath — wrath that is becoming manifest in nature itself, in the workings of this world... May the gods preserve us, how did we not notice this sooner..." {n}Yrliet glances at you before immediately looking away.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Это гнев Лилэтан — гнев, нашедший воплощение в самой природе, в самом естестве мироустройства... да хранят нас боги, как мы не замечали этого раньше..." {n}Бросив на вас взгляд, Ирлиэт тут же отводит глаза.{/n}

"It is the Lilaethan's wrath — wrath that is becoming manifest in nature itself, in the workings of this world... May the gods preserve us, how did we not notice this sooner..." {n}Yrliet glances at you before immediately looking away.{/n}

languages.text: 「リラエタンからの報復…報復それ自体は自然の摂理にして、この星の働き…。神がお守りくださっているというのに、どうしてもっと早く気付けなかったのか…」{n}ユリエットはこちらを見つめてから、さっと顔をそむける。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the Lilaethan's wrath — wrath that is becoming manifest in nature itself, in the workings of this world... May the gods preserve us, how did we not notice this sooner..." {n}Yrliet glances at you before immediately looking away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「リラエタンからの報復…報復それ自体は自然の摂理にして、この星の働き…。神がお守りくださっているというのに、どうしてもっと早く気付けなかったのか…」{n}ユリエットはこちらを見つめてから、さっと顔をそむける。{/n}

languages.text: “这是莉莱赞的愤怒，她的愤怒体现在这个世界的运转方式，体现在大自然本身……愿诸神保佑我们，我们怎么没能早点发现……”{n}伊莉耶特瞥了你一眼，然后立刻转过了头。{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the Lilaethan's wrath — wrath that is becoming manifest in nature itself, in the workings of this world... May the gods preserve us, how did we not notice this sooner..." {n}Yrliet glances at you before immediately looking away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “这是莉莱赞的愤怒，她的愤怒体现在这个世界的运转方式，体现在大自然本身……愿诸神保佑我们，我们怎么没能早点发现……”{n}伊莉耶特瞥了你一眼，然后立刻转过了头。{/n}

languages.text: «Es la furia del Lilaethan, una furia que se manifiesta en la propia naturaleza, en los tejemanejes de este mundo... Que los dioses nos amparen. ¿Cómo no nos hemos dado cuenta antes?». {n}Yrliet te lanza una mirada antes de apartarla enseguida.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the Lilaethan's wrath — wrath that is becoming manifest in nature itself, in the workings of this world... May the gods preserve us, how did we not notice this sooner..." {n}Yrliet glances at you before immediately looking away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Es la furia del Lilaethan, una furia que se manifiesta en la propia naturaleza, en los tejemanejes de este mundo... Que los dioses nos amparen. ¿Cómo no nos hemos dado cuenta antes?». {n}Yrliet te lanza una mirada antes de apartarla enseguida.{/n}

languages.text: "Das ist der Zorn von Lileath – er manifestiert sich in der Natur selbst, in der Funktionsweise dieser Welt ... Mögen die Götter uns schützen! Wie konnten wir das nicht früher bemerken ...?" {n}Yrliet sieht dich an und wendet den Blick sofort wieder ab.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the Lilaethan's wrath — wrath that is becoming manifest in nature itself, in the workings of this world... May the gods preserve us, how did we not notice this sooner..." {n}Yrliet glances at you before immediately looking away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das ist der Zorn von Lileath – er manifestiert sich in der Natur selbst, in der Funktionsweise dieser Welt ... Mögen die Götter uns schützen! Wie konnten wir das nicht früher bemerken ...?" {n}Yrliet sieht dich an und wendet den Blick sofort wieder ab.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est la colère de la lilaethan qui se manifeste dans la nature et dans le fonctionnement même du monde... Les dieux nous préservent, comment se fait-il que nous ne l'ayons pas remarqué plus tôt ? » {n}Yrliet vous lance un regard furtif puis se détourne.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the Lilaethan's wrath — wrath that is becoming manifest in nature itself, in the workings of this world... May the gods preserve us, how did we not notice this sooner..." {n}Yrliet glances at you before immediately looking away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est la colère de la lilaethan qui se manifeste dans la nature et dans le fonctionnement même du monde... Les dieux nous préservent, comment se fait-il que nous ne l'ayons pas remarqué plus tôt ? » {n}Yrliet vous lance un regard furtif puis se détourne.{/n}

languages.text: "Bu, Lilaethan'ın öfkesi. Öfke doğanın kendisinde, bu dünyanın işleyişinde vücut buluyor. Tanrılar bizi esirgesin, bunu daha önce nasıl fark edemedik?" {n}Yrliet sana kaçamak bir bakış atıp anında başını çeviriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "It is the Lilaethan's wrath — wrath that is becoming manifest in nature itself, in the workings of this world... May the gods preserve us, how did we not notice this sooner..." {n}Yrliet glances at you before immediately looking away.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Bu, Lilaethan'ın öfkesi. Öfke doğanın kendisinde, bu dünyanın işleyişinde vücut buluyor. Tanrılar bizi esirgesin, bunu daha önce nasıl fark edemedik?" {n}Yrliet sana kaçamak bir bakış atıp anında başını çeviriyor.{/n}
